title: Comparative Analysis of E-Learning Design Across Continents: Applying Science and Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic e-learning tools and intermediate-level knowledge in science
context.additional_context: Learners utilize personal devices (BYOD) for project execution, engaging in collaborative activities aimed at solving real-world problems in the sciences.

learning_goals: Compare representative e-learning design models from the U.S. and Europe and explain key differences.
Propose at least three continent-specific educational strategies applicable to project-based learning in science.
Propose an e-learning design framework tailored to learner characteristics based on analytical results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
